nodes.text: Archon Quarry was the name given to the eastern half of the Cartel mining mesa on the planet Makeb. It was the site of Drilling Platforms Duba, Keeta, and K'wanna, which were anchored to the sides of the mesa along the edge of the quarry, as well as Communications Bunker 31 and the mesa's Control Center.
The Archon Quarry was added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic along with the rest of the planet Makeb in the 2013 Digital Expansion Star Wars: The Old Republic: Rise of the Hutt Cartel.
